Conjunctions.title: subordinating conjunctions
Conjunctions.description: instances of the subordinating conjunctions: als ob, bevor, da, dass/daß, falls, nachdem, ob, obwohl, seit, seitdem, weil, or wenn

Conjunctions.title: words used as preposition and subordinating conjunction
als
Conjunctions.description: instances of 'als' in all of its uses (than, while, when, as, etc.)

Relative Clauses.title: relative clause
Relative Clauses.description: relative clauses beginning with a relative pronoun

Relative Clauses.title: relative clause starting with preposition
Relative Clauses.description: relative clauses beginning with a preposition

Verbs.title: infinitive clause
Verbs.description: instances of anstatt, ohne, statt, um, or nothing ... zu (instead of, without, in order to)

Verbs.title: modal verbs (dürfen, können, möchten, mögen, müssen, sollen, wollen)
Verbs.description: modal verbs in first person, second person formal, or third person

Verbs.title: modal verbs (conjugated in du/ihr form)
Verbs.description: modal verbs in second person informal (singular or plural)

Verbs.title: past participle + 'sein'
Verbs.description: instances of past participles that require 'sein'

Verbs.title: simple/weak past participle
Verbs.description: past participles beginning with ge- and ending in -t

Verbs.title: irregular past participle
Verbs.description: past participles beginning with ge- and ending in -en

Verbs.title: inseparable prefix verbs
Verbs.description: verbs beginning with be-, emp-, ent-, er-, miss-, ver-, or zer-

Verbs.title: inseparable prefix past participle
Verbs.description: past participles beginning with be-, emp-, ent-, er-, miss-, ver-, or zu-

Verbs.title: 'ge-' infinitive
Verbs.description: instances of infinitives beginning with ge-

Prefixes/Suffixes/Compounds.title: da-compounds
Prefixes/Suffixes/Compounds.description: compounds such as dabei, daran, dazu, drunter, etc.

Miscellaneous.title: comparative
Miscellaneous.description: instances of comparisons usually with 'als', for example, 'größer als'

Miscellaneous.title: negation
Miscellaneous.description: instances of 'nicht nur ... sondern' ('not only ... but also')
